scripts.win-dev: rmdir /s /q .parcel-cache & parcel build styles/death_page/* styles/play_page/modules/* styles/play_page/play_style.scss styles/start_page/start_style.scss styles/start_page/modules/* styles/general/* images/skins/* images/items/* images/*.png templates/* & parcel
scripts.dev: rm -rf .parcel-cache & parcel build styles/death_page/* styles/play_page/* styles/start_page/start_style.scss styles/start_page/modules/* styles/general/* images/skins/* images/items/* images/*.png templates/* & parcel
scripts.build: parcel build styles/death_page/* styles/play_page/modules/* styles/play_page/play_style.scss styles/start_page/start_style.scss styles/start_page/modules/* styles/general/* images/skins/* images/items/* images/*.png templates/*
